# Diagnosis and Treatment The primary function of the [color=lightblue]medical doctor[/color] is to diagnose and treat injuries and viruses.
The primary function of the [color=orange]chemist[/color] is to provide medicines to [color=lightblue]medical doctors[/color] in liquid or pill form to facilitate treatment.
This section provides details on how to do diagnosis and treatment in a logical and efficient manner.
